text: Check this
I’m going nuts
Completely new tables without columns and also a value for name aren’t working

Hi everyone, I get tokens on our test application while connecting our platform to the HubSpot, but didnot get any tokens and also any errors while trying connect on production what can be the issue? All configurations are the same, just related keys changed on  test and prod
<@UGDF9EBPW> did you get a fix for this I've just started seeing the exact same issue.
Not yet
Have a ticket with support
<@U6W3H6YN8>

Really odd, i have also logged a ticket with as much debug information and examples as i can get out, really odd as this was working for me a few hours ago when i published the page then my boss noticed the page was empty :grimacing:
<@U25PYL3Q8> Thanks, will do it that way.
It was suddenly there for us as well!

Hello everyone,

Is it possible to pull custom objects or your information from a contact or a Deal to a Customer Portal?
We are looking into this
Awesome. Thank you

Hi all, please let me know if I'm in the wrong channel. I was directed here by a support agent.  I would like to add the ability for attachments directly in the quote template. For this, I need to create a custom quote template in the design manager, which will offer a higher-level editing interface allowing me to use an HTML to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules|customize modules> and other elements of the quote template. I need help from someone who has coding/developers knowledge to do this, because by default you can not add an attachment to a quote. Thanks in advance!
Seems to be resolved!
Yep, should be fully resolved now. Sorry about that
No worries, happy it's working again
Like the customer ticket portal?
It's a workaround. But you could have a file field on the deal where you can attach a file. Then you can just reference that file in the custom quote template like this:

You would then put the url of the file (you can find this by going to marketing=>files and templates=>files=>click on a file=>click copy url)
in the filefield
Another solution would be to use a HubDB table and have the columns: Deal ID, File (image or video), Filename. Then lookup all the 'associated' files when you send a quote
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1664432766202009>
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C016CS822C9/p1664379976226989>

I am wondering how long this new Data Protection tab area has been around in HubSpot, I have never seen this area before, we were using the Cookies tab before, but somehow this newer tab interacts and changes things on the Cookies tab with turn on default cookie policy, curious on how long this has been available? We had the Default policy enabled but when I came back to that area it was turned off, and interacting with the Enable GDPR tools, turns it back on, so I think when this was deployed to portals it turns off my original settings

Hi folks. The company I work for has been evaluating some analytics tools (Heap, Pendo, etc.) until I realized that HubSpot has its own analytics. So I'm in the process of looking into doing that. Is it correct that I *have* to build a HubSpot app to do this? This is *only* to collect custom events from our own software, so I would want an app to be private. But it says "private apps do not support extensions, *custom timeline events* or webhooks. If you plan on building an app using these features, you should create a public app instead." (emphasis mine). Does this mean a private app does not have access to `trackCustomBehavioralEvent`?

Hi Folks, I am good with HTML, CSS, JS. But my new workplace uses HubSpot. I am undergoing some courses on HubSpot Academy to get myself familiar with how to develop stuff in HubSpot. I see there is a templating language called HubL to create modules, templates, and themes. However, the course videos are not super clear. Do you know of good tutorials on how to develop custom modules with HubL? I would specifically like a video where the code starts from the beginning and shows all the steps to finish creating that custom module. Thanks in advance to anybody who can guide me to such resources.

Honestly to learn about HubL and how to write it the docs are going to be super helpful:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#format>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/operators-and-expression-tests>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags/dnd-areas>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates>

<@U0442L6E7EJ> While not videos — ive a few blog posts that might be good starting points

<https://devbeej.com/library/modules-learning-the-basics/>
<https://devbeej.com/library/advanced-HubSpot-module-building/>

<#C22PU4LV8|general> Hello partners!!! We are immersed in a challenge for a client. We have created a custom object for the client, which in this case is a product with multiple denominations. The case is that the client wants to have all the associated commercial activities. We have seen that this can be done, but it does NOT get us the reports of the commercial activities by custom object, has anyone encountered this challenge? Apparently HubSpot is limited in this matter and we are looking at the best way to obtain these reports, since it is very important for the client. Do you know any alternative? Anyone get this kind of info? Is there a way to do it with the API? workflow? Thanks in advance and happy Friday
